t: Amazon Brand Registry: Protect and Build Your Brand in the UK
s: Amazon Brand Registry is a programme designed to protect your intellectual property, offering sellers an exclusive set of brand benefit tools. Explore them now!

t: Amazon’s new 'Buy for Me' feature helps customers find and buy products from other brands’ sites
s: April 3, 2025 - New beta feature allows customers to use their Amazon Shopping app to complete purchases from other brand retailer websites if Amazon doesn’t sell the item directly.

t: Brand owners How to build your brand with Amazon DE
s: No matter how big your brand is, with Amazon stores, you can tell your customers about your story, your vision, and your products. You can use the Store Builder in the Advertising Console to create an e-commerce storefront on Amazon. No programming or design knowledge is required for this.

t: Brand+ and Performance+ Now Available in Amazon DSP Globally | Amazon Ads
s: March 21, 2025 - Amazon DSP introduces Brand+ and Performance+: AI-powered tools that simplify campaign management and optimize for your goals.

t: Sponsored Brands – Increase brand awareness | Amazon Ads
s: Sponsored ads on Amazon help build your brand and drive sales. Invest in long-term business growth by advertising your brand and products on Amazon.

t: Nike to resume selling directly on Amazon for first time since 2019
s: 2 weeks ago - Nike confirmed to CNBC that its shoes are returning to Amazon.

t: BASDEHEN Brand Kitchen Faucets Recalled Due to Dangerous Lead Exposure for Young Children; Sold on Amazon.com by Chenfeng Store | CPSC.gov
s: Consumers should immediately stop using these faucets and contact Chenfeng Store about disposal and a refund. Consumers will need to provide a photograph of disposal to receive the refund. s: Saks on Amazon offers a curated selection of luxury fashion and beauty items.

t: Brand Stores: Kostenlos eine Markenseite auf Amazon erstellen | Amazon Ads
s: Brand Stores helfen Ihnen dabei, die Markenbekanntheit zu steigern, indem Sie Ihre Marke und Ihren Produktkatalog unter Ihrer eigenen Amazon-Webadresse präsentieren. Sie können einen Brand Store ohne zusätzliche Kosten erstellen – ohne dass eine Programmierung notwendig ist.
